Interface ec.ezlib.prim.Resolver

public interface Resolver
Like the old Distributor or EResult. Resolves the state of a Promise (or other Promise-like Deliverators).

forward(Object)
Queues all accumulated and future messages for delivery to target, and, for example, a Promise becomes resolved into being E-equivalent to the target.
smash(Throwable)
Breaks the Promise, reporting 'problem' as the reason.
state()
One of "UNRESOLVED", "FORWARDED", or "BROKEN".

state 
 public abstract String state()
One of "UNRESOLVED", "FORWARDED", or "BROKEN". May not be "DEFERRED" or "KEPT", as that would leak information.

"UNRESOLVED" => forward()ing and smash()ing are still allowed.

"FORWARDED" => smash()ing is still allowed.

"BROKEN" => forward()ing is disallowed and smash()ing will be ignored.

forward 
 public abstract void forward(Object target)
Queues all accumulated and future messages for delivery to target, and, for example, a Promise becomes resolved into being E-equivalent to the target.

smash 
 public abstract boolean smash(Throwable problem)
Breaks the Promise, reporting 'problem' as the reason. Afterward is always BROKEN, but returns whether this call broke it.
